QuestData.Title: Instructor Razuvious Must Die!
QuestData.Description: Instructor Razuvious smugly struts about the Military Quarter of Naxxramas. It is said that only a death knight personally trained by him could possibly even withstand the prowess of his blade.$B$BYou and your group are going to prove everyone wrong.$B$BThe Council of Six has decreed that Razuvious must die!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Instructor Razuvious.$B$BThis quest can be completed with any difficulty or size raid.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $c. The Scourge military command out of Naxxramas has been thrown into disarray by Razuvious's demise.
